description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow changes to minor fenestration in relation to planning permission reference 222211FUL dated 23/01/2023 for 'Conversion of existing building (2 flats) into 3 self-contained flats; single-storey rear/side wraparound extension; replacement of windows on rear and side elevations; installation of one window to rear (main) roof slope; two rooflights to front roof slope and three to rear outrigger roof. '
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: 21015 (P) 205_P Proposed First Floor Plan, 21015 (P) 207_R Proposed Roof Plan, 21015 (P) 211_T Existing and Proposed Ground site plan, 21015 (P) 214_R Proposed Ground Floor Plan, 21015 (P) 215_Q Proposed Second Floor Plan, 21015 (P) 231_O Proposed Front and Rear Elevation, 21015 (P) 232_N Proposed Side Elevation, 21015 (P) 233_O Proposed Rear Elevation - context, 21015 (P) 234_H Proposed Section BB, 21015 (P) 235_H Proposed Section CC, Cover Letter prepared by Place 54 Architects dated 20th June 2023.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
